news_header: Bolsonaro charged with conspiracy to poison Lula and stage a coup.
news_original_title: Brazil prosecutor charges Bolsonaro with 2022 coup plot
news_text: Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro is charged with conspiring to poison his successor, President Lula, as part of a coup attempt. Prosecutor-General Paulo Gonet stated that Bolsonaro and 33 accomplices planned to undermine democratic institutions and agreed to a plot named 'Green and Yellow Dagger.' The Supreme Court will decide on the charges, while Bolsonaro claims persecution.
